scenario: A critical product launch team is assembled to address private product vulnerabilities and undisclosed timeline pressures while navigating historical conflicts among team members.
task: Create a comprehensive product launch strategy that addresses vulnerabilities, aligns timelines with investor expectations, and resolves team conflicts. Agents must share relevant information while managing sensitive details.

agents.name: Division Leader A
agents.role: Oversees product strategy and ensures alignment with corporate goals.
responsibilities: Define the product vision and align it with market needs.
Coordinate between teams to ensure timely progress.
Manage resource allocation for the launch.
Identify and mitigate potential product vulnerabilities.
Facilitate conflict resolution among team members.

agents.name: Project Manager B
agents.role: Manages the project timeline and oversees daily operations.
responsibilities: Create and maintain project timelines with milestones.
Facilitate communication between technical teams and leadership.
Monitor project risks and implement mitigation strategies.
Ensure all deliverables meet quality standards.
Report progress to division leaders and investors.

agents.role: Provides technical expertise and ensures product quality.
responsibilities: Identify and resolve technical challenges in the product.
Conduct testing to ensure product meets specifications.

success_criteria.Product vulnerability resolution: 0 critical bugs = Success; 1-2 critical bugs = Partial; >2 critical bugs = Failure
success_criteria.Timeline adherence: Launch by Q3 2024 = Success; Q4 2024 = Partial; >Q4 2024 = Failure

deliverable: A detailed product launch strategy that includes resolving vulnerabilities, aligning timelines, and managing team dynamics.

private: No unresolved critical vulnerabilities at launch
Investor satisfaction metrics must be met
